name: Zelda 2 Horror Prototype
description:
A horror take on the classic NES game Zelda 2 created with Unreal Engine 4. Explore a different side of the world with a mysterious mirror that teleports Link to a horrific version of the world he has grown to know. Can Link survive the horrors of the Mirror World?

Created as a prototype for class, the project will not be updated from this first upload. Created by Team Pain and published by Dark Star Games. 

Team Pain:

  • Devan Johnson (Dark Star Games)
  • Airron Kennedy
  • Marcus Bogner
  • Hector Bermudez
  • Jeremy Rowe

Controls:

(Keyboard)/(Controller)

  • WASD/Left Stick - Movement
  • Space/A - Jump
  • Left Mouse/Right Trigger - Attack
  • Right Mouse/Left Trigger - Magic
  • E/X - Interact
  • CTRL/B - Crouch
  • ESC/Start - Pause
  • Tab/Y - Inventory

Zelda II: The Adventure of Link & the Link Model are properties of Nintendo 

All Rights Reserved 

*Note this is in 7z format you are going to need software that can unzip this format
